PLAYBY3.original: ~s~Backup has arrived to protect the last ~r~leader.~s~ Take him down.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~已有增援前来保护最后一个~r~领袖。~s~解决他。

PLAYBY3.original: ~s~Go to the construction site and find the first ~r~Union leader.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~前往建筑工地，找到第一个~r~工会领袖。

PLAYBY3.original: ~s~Take out the ~r~lookouts.
~s~You've been spotted. Get to the ~r~first leader~s~ and take him out.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~你被发现了。找到~r~第一个领袖，~s~做掉他。

PLAYBY3.original: ~s~Use the sniper rifle to take them out.
~s~Go to the ~g~car~s~ in the alley downtown.
~s~Playboy has left the weapons in a ~g~car~s~ in an alley downtown.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~Playboy在市中心的小巷的~g~车~s~里放了武器。

PLAYBY3.original: ~r~The car holding the weapons has been destroyed.
~s~Get in the ~g~car~s~ to retrieve weapons.
~r~Playboy was abandoned.
~s~To throw a grenade, free aim or lock on to a target then press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to pull the pin. Release ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to throw the grenade.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~要投掷手雷，自由瞄准或锁定一个目标，然后按~INPUT_ATTACK~拉环，松开~INPUT_ATTACK~掷出手雷。

PLAYBY3.original: ~r~The last Union leader got away.
~s~Strike out the ~r~Union leaders.
~s~You left ~b~Playboy~s~ behind.
~s~To throw a grenade, aim at a target then press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to pull the pin. Release ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to throw the grenade.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~要投掷手雷，瞄准目标后按~INPUT_ATTACK~拉环，松开~INPUT_ATTACK~掷出手雷。

PLAYBY3.original: ~s~You'll see better from a good vantage point.
~r~Playboy is dead.
~s~When not aiming press then release ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to drop a grenade.
PLAYBY3.translated: ~s~未进行瞄准时，按下~INPUT_ATTACK~后松开可原地扔雷。

PLAYBY3.original: ~s~There are lookouts on 3 of the cranes.
~s~The longer you hold ~INPUT_ATTACK~ the shorter the fuse will become.
~s~Take down the next ~r~Union leader.
